# Shannon Rankin

**Passive Acoustic Research \| Program Management  \|  Science Education \| Open Science  **

Wildlife Research Biologist and Lead of the Southwest Acoustic Ecology Lab at Southwest Fisheries Science Center (NOAA Fisheries). I use passive acoustic monitoring (sound!) as a tool to study dolphin and whale populations.
